critique: The document pertains to delaying certain transfers, consolidations, and eliminations as provided for under section 4 of Executive Order No. 6166. It focuses on the function of disbursement exercised by United States Marshals under the Department of Justice, and with respect to the function of disbursement for the Postal Service. The document appears neutral in ideological tilt. It seems to expand executive power by delaying the implementation of certain orders. It doesn't directly address immigration, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. It is also neutral on federalism.
